title:
Vanishing of the quantum reduction of the Deligne exceptional series
  representations of negative integer level
abstract:
In this paper we show that, for the Deligne exceptional series
representations of negative integer level of affine Lie algebras, the quantum
Hamiltonian reduction vanishes except for the cases where the nilpotent element
is conjugate to $e_{-\theta}$ or $e_{-\theta_s}$.
